events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, and the package has not arrived yet. The tracking info hasn't updated for several days.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Delivery Delay based on their complaint about a late shipment and stale tracking information.
Support agent Sarah M. was assigned to handle the delivery delay case reported by the customer about their order.
Hello! I’m Sarah from the support team. I understand your order hasn't arrived yet, and I’ll do my best to help you figure this out.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking number you have so I can check the shipment status with our courier?
Sure, the order number is 123456789, and the tracking number is XYZ987654321. The last update was five days ago.
I checked with the courier, and they reported a temporary delay due to weather conditions in your area. The package is expected to be delivered in the next 3 days.
Thanks for the information, but I really needed this package sooner. Is there any way to expedite the delivery or get compensation for the delay?
I understand the inconvenience. I have arranged for faster shipping at no extra cost, and we will also issue a 10% refund on your order as a goodwill gesture.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate your prompt help and the refund offer.
The expedited shipping has been confirmed, and the refund is being processed. Your issue is now resolved, and you should see the package soon.
Just checking in to confirm that your package has arrived and that you are satisfied with the resolution and refund provided.
Since there has been no further reply, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
